content: That's a great point about inconsistent braking points. I think I need to work on developing a more consistent braking technique, especially since I've been experimenting with different brake pads and settings. Speaking of which, I was really impressed with the new brake pads I installed before the Turbocharged Weekend event. They gave me a lot more confidence during the hard braking zones. Do you think I should consider upgrading my brake fluid as well to further improve my braking performance?
